# Chabubi Discovery Series - Educational Science Books for Young Children

## About
Educational children's book series introducing real physics concepts to ages 0-6.
Author: Ronen Amos
First book: "Chabubi Discovers Gravity" (חבובי מגלה את כוח המשיכה)
Planned series of 10 books combining science education with engaging storytelling.
Contact: ronenamos@gmail.com

## Main Pages

https://ronenamos-arch.github.io/AI-Books/
https://ronenamos-arch.github.io/AI-Books/index-en.html

## Book Information

**Chabubi Discovers Gravity**
- 12 illustrated pages introducing gravity concepts
- Rhyming text format for early readers
- Real science concepts adapted for young children
- Vibrant illustrations with relatable characters
- Available in Hebrew and English

### Key Topics Covered:
- Introduction to gravity
- Magnetic forces and experiments
- Celestial mechanics and space
- Practical everyday applications
- Hands-on learning activities
